definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: qun2 dai4 zi1 ben3 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: But in general Americans are warier of government than of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 然而，美國民衆警惕政府，多於警惕資本主義。

sentences.english: The union is oriented towards welfare capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 工會以福利資本主義爲其奮鬥目標。

sentences.english: As the United States suffers under Obamanomics , China prospers under Capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 美國在奧巴馬經濟下受苦，中國在資本主義下繁榮。

sentences.english: But you cannot imagine the end of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 然而，你卻無法想像資本主義的末日。

sentences.english: The abolition of capitalism and landlordism in Cuba represented an enormous step forward.
sentences.chinese: 古巴對資本主義和地主制度的廢除是一個很大的進步。

sentences.english: The Soviet commitment to the destruction of capitalism is not purely ritualistic and proforma.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯聲稱要消滅資本主義不僅僅是形式上的。

sentences.english: Tow models, namely US and European ones, exist in the world capitalist market today.
sentences.chinese: 世界資本主義市場經濟主要存在美國和歐洲兩種模式。

sentences.english: We place no hopes in the inclusion of new capitalist powers.
sentences.chinese: 我們不對這些新的資本主義權力者抱有任何期望。

sentences.english: Three adjustments and three metamorphoses make capitalism the modern characters.
sentences.chinese: 三次調整，三次蛻變，資本主義具有了現代色彩。

sentences.english: The olor=# cc0066> essence of his argument is that capitalism cannot succeed.
sentences.chinese: 他的論點的核心是資本主義不能成功。

sentences.english: It's said to be anti-capitalist, with the undertone that carries of being anti-American.
sentences.chinese: 據稱這是反資本主義，潛含有反美的意味。

sentences.english: But it's a mistake to equate peer production with anticapitalism.
sentences.chinese: 但是將合作生產和反資本主義則是錯誤的。

sentences.english: Private-equity firms are the new kings of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 私募股本公司是資本主義的新主子。

sentences.english: It all sounds suspiciously like the old capitalism to me.
sentences.chinese: 這一切在我聽來似乎都像舊資本主義。

sentences.english: This is the advantage or disadvantage of a socialist/capitalistic type of system.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，這是社會主義的優勢和資本主義的劣勢。

sentences.english: JAPAN has long practised a form of familial capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 日本長期實行着一種家族資本主義的模式。
